## GlobalContexts.getApplicableContexts() method

Returns all applicable global contexts for a specified event

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getApplicableContexts(event: PayloadBuilder): Array<SelfDescribingJson>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  event | PayloadBuilder | The event to check for applicable global contexts for |
